WaterGun.name: Water Gun
WaterGun.describtion: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

WaterPulse.name: Water Pulse
WaterPulse.describtion: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water.

BubbleBeam.name: Bubble Beam
BubbleBeam.describtion: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the opposing team.

Waterfall.name: Waterfall
Waterfall.describtion: The user charges at the target on a huge waterfall.

AquaTail.name: Aqua Tail
AquaTail.describtion: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

HydroPump.name: Hydro Pump
HydroPump.describtion: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

HydroCannon.name: Hydro Cannon
HydroCannon.describtion: The target is hit with a watery blast. The user must rest on the next turn, however.
